body.name: Projector 4K Support with 5G WiFi Bluetooth, CIBEST Android TV 10 Native 1080P Full-Sealed Optical Engine Home Movie Outdoor Projector with Netflix/Prime Video Built-in, Autofocus, Apps, Stereo Sound
features: 📺𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐂𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 - Immerse yourself in the world of high-definition entertainment with our projector's stunning features. Boasting 1080p Full HD Resolution and a powerful 500 ANSI Lumens Brightness, this 4K projector takes video quality to the next level, revealing over 225% more details than standard 1080p projectors. Prepare for a visual adventure like no other.

📽️𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐃𝐮𝐬𝐭-𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐄𝐫𝐚 - Bid farewell to lens cleaning woes. Our dust-proof projector features a fully-sealed optical engine that shields against dust infiltrating behind the lens. This safeguard fully protects vital components like chips and color wheels, ensuring flawless operation. Say goodbye to black dots and extend your projector's lifespan to a remarkable 100,000 hours—easy maintenance with zero worries.

📱𝐖𝐢𝐅𝐢𝟔 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 & 𝐁𝐥𝐮𝐞𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡 - Seamlessly connect with Dual-Band WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities. Whether you're enjoying a high-res film, indulging in top-tier music, or immersing yourself in gaming, expect lightning-fast speeds and unwavering stability. With Bluetooth functionality, effortlessly pair your preferred headphones, speakers, or other audio devices. Plus, our projector comes with Chromecast built-in.

✅𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐟𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐬 & 𝐆𝐨𝐨𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭 - This intelligent 4K projector supports AutoFocus and electronic focus adjustments via the remote control, ensuring a crisp, clear display. Utilize Google Assistant for quick searches - press a button and speak your query. Experience the ultimate convenience with CIBEST's outdoor movie projector.

🎁𝐄𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 E𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 - This home theater projector is equipped with Android TV 10.0 and offers access to over 8,000 apps from Google Play. Immerse yourself in music, games, and a user-friendly interface. Stream over a million movies and TV episodes from top providers like Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+, Peacock, and more. Additionally, enjoy millions of songs. For effortless screen mirroring, download the Chromecast app and cast media from your Android or iOS devices to this

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Best 4K Support Video Projector with Wifi & Bluetooth for Home Theater Endetertainment Feature of G1 : Real Dust-free Projector - Full-sealed Optical Engine designEndless Content with Android TV 10.0Native 1080P and 4K-supported HD image quality500 ANSI Lux Outstanding BrightnessGoogle Voice Assistant allows you to control your content from the couchStunning picture quality up to 300 inchesBuilt-in Hi-Fi stereo speaker(10W)95% Brightness Uniformity20000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio5G +2.4G WIFI 6 lag-free5.0 Bluetooth Connection100%-50% Zoom function

Why choose the CIBEST Full-sealed Optical Engine（Dust-proof）Projector？ Most equipment is constantly exposed to the air even when not in use, resulting in dust accumulation that can cause damage. The finer dust can still accumulate on the color wheel, leading to degraded images and reduced brightness.The bulbs in traditional lamp projectors often reach temperatures as high as 800~900°C while operating, occasionally even forcing automatic shutdowns due to heat surges. The fact of the matter is that projectors need to be dust-resistant！ In recent years, CIBEST has been actively investing in and developing dust-resistant technology for use in our Projectors.The CIBEST Android TV Projectors feature comprehensive dustproof technology with a sealed optical engine to fully protect chips, color wheels, and other optical components. G1 Sealed optical engine Projectors can avoid common projector issues such as spotty projection and color degradation., making them impervious to dust accumulation.Most important is the fact that Full-sealed Optical engines can reduce expenditures on maintenance and also reduce the time and trouble required to fix equipment.

This home theater projector is embedded with Android TV 10.0 & 8000+ Apps Over 1 million movies and TV episodes！ Enjoy favorites from Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, Disney+, HBO Max, Apple TV+, Peacock, STARZ, SHOWTIME, Paramount+, and others. Stream live TV, news, and sports, and even watch for free with Pluto TV, Amazon Freevee, YouTube, and more. Plus, play millions of songs through services like Amazon Music, Apple Music, Spotify, Pandora, and iHeartRadio. Subscription fees may apply. You can just easy to open Netflix etc. your favorite apps on the home theater projector and watch your favorite movies and shows. No need to play Netflix through an extra TV Stick. Just turn on the projector to play. Put down your phone.With Google Play built-in, you can explore endless entertainment on the G1 projector.Download Chromecast, you can cast your favorite videos from your tablet or laptop to your TV.Are you annoyed by typing slowly to search for movies you want to watch? the smart projector is equipped with Google Assistant. Simply press the “Google Assistant” button on the remote control and say your favorite shows, movies, and apps to find them easily.
Time-Saving Management CIBEST G1 smart projector allows voice search assistance. Easily stream all the TV shows, and download your favorite apps without hassle.

Your life more exciting with Big Screen Home Theater Movie Projector — With a 30''-300'' large screen and 100%-50% Zoom function.The 4k support projector native 1080p with WiFi6 is perfect for movies and World Cup watching.Let's turn your home into a movie theater with Cibest projector-G1!

Instantly Clear Image Once you fire up the G1 1080p projector, the autofocus will kick into action, removing any blur or distortion for a crystal-clear image. No Noise Low noise & low energy consumption can extend the movie projector life, and create a quiet and comfortable operational environment. Bluetooth Connect Dual-channel stereo speakers and Passive low-frequency radiators， you could enjoy a cinema-like audio feast while staying at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The picture quality is pretty good and it's easy to use. The speakers are decent, I plugged a soundbar into mine. The auto focus is cool. it has Google play store so you can download all your streaming apps to the projector without having to use a separate device. Although it does have an hdmi port on it and I have played my Xbox on the projector. It would be fun to play Mario kart or something on there. It's a good deal if you get it on sale!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing 4K quality projector
reviews.reviewText: The projector has a crisp 4K image with amazing autofocus. My house has white walls, so I am able to move it from room to room with ease. Set up was super easy, and the WiFi connection is great. The Android TV box makes it easy to open streaming apps or use as a casting device. The volume levels are loud and clear. Best picture quality in a mostly dark room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Came as advertised. Very happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST HAVE!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The projector is great, android tv being included is a plus. You just have to find the right place to put it in your home. The android tv gives you endless app options and I didn’t even need to add downloader on it because you can just airplay anything you want to it with the airscreen app. It looks great in the daylight too and even better at night. The quality is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Customer Service Nonexistent
reviews.reviewText: The projector will not hook up to the wifi. I have tried SEVERAL times emailing their site with no response. I am very disappointed in this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up
reviews.reviewText: This is a great projector! Color and sound are great. Easy set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value from the warehouse!
reviews.reviewText: For the price (I paid under 50 bucks as a "used" warehouse unit), this projector is awesome. True native 1080p, above average sound for a projector (louder than the speakers on my 40" element led tv), loud enough to enjoy normal programming indoors without external audio. The brightness is way better than the last projector I owned, u can watch it with the lights on. I wasn't expecting that. Awesome. Of course, better with lights dim or off completely but definitely watchable in regular lighted space indoors. Haven't tried outdoors yet. Plenty of I/O solutions. I use a roku stick and stream from netflix, amazon, or I cast from Samsung phone or my Asus laptop. Only con I have found, which isn't enough to knock off a star, especially since it's clearly represented if you're paying attention.... This sucker is ginourmous. Not gonna fit in ur pocket, purse, or even a small backpack.... The box it comes in makes an excellent padded case for light portability. Even has a handle. If you can find a deal on this projector snatch it up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very satisfied purchase!
reviews.reviewText: This is our third outdoor projector and we finally found the one that has all of the features we were looking for. It has perfect viewing quality, very user friendly and the sound is great with or without speakers. In addition purchased the recommended mount! Very impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this to make a movie room- it is such a great bit of kit for the money (we got it on offer it was £160).. the built in android tv is excellent, set up was simple and the quality is fantastic. We played on a 100 inch screen, the autofocus made it really easy to get sharp picture, we didn't bother linking to any external speaker as sound quality was good enough. No fan noise, I was impressed...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is my 2nd projector.And wowww this one blows my first one away...The quality of this is brilliant.Treated myself as a Christmas box and very happy The quality at 80 inch tested in kitchen on white wall.. and 120 inch my main living room screen...amazing... The sound is good for some films.other films can be a tad quiet.Nothing a Bluetooth soundbar cant fix i have a 50 watt soundbar and connect to this projector the sound is like imax.The android 10 is a added bonus easy to install Netflix and a variety of apps.5 gigs of storage for apps so more than enough for your main apps.The fan noise is very quiet.It gets a little hot heat at the side and can give out a smell.Maybe its because it new.Only used it today...The remote lets it down though,It can be very sticky and freeze alot when scrolling And it a pain if you need to type passwords and email addresses slow and sticks.Not sure if a remote software update is needed. I have enclosed some photos and few videos.Overall this is the best money i have ever spent ,And i am very happy with my purchase.Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to set up, great focus
reviews.reviewText: Really good quality product. Portable with a bag and easy for a grandad to set up without any help. I am very happy with this projector. It is as described and came the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Some excellent and some tweaks would have made it perfect
reviews.reviewText: Overall picture quality is good but quickly degrades on edges (out of focus) unless projector is perfectly level. The colours are bright and sound is good from unit but drops out regularly when connected to a bluetooth speaker (not that it's really needed). The built in TV player (Netflix and other Android apps) is great and you can stream all normal account TV direct to the projector which is a great feature that works well. Autofocus is poor and not precise and manual focus mode appears to have 'stops' which prevent you getting a really clear picture at times which is frustrating. Biggest issue is the fact that the screen size on the main projector 'settings' page is massive and not adjustable meaning that using any of the settings is fiddly and full of guesswork as they are cast off of the screen on walls and curtains. Once set up though, this isn't an issue as they aren't needed again. All in all, for the price, a good purchase that works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had a number of projectors logger time from expensive to cheap. This projector is awesome, I mean you can watch it without the curtains being shut although obviously it's so much better in the dark. Sound is pretty good too and the fact it's got android to boot...... Well worth the money!
